_comments: # Military fleet icon depends on fleet power level

FLEET_ICON_POWER_TIERS.ON_LEADER_MOUSE_OVER_OPACITY: 0.3 # Opacity effect when mouse overing a leader for reassignmnet
FLEET_ICON_POWER_TIERS.ON_NO_LEADER_MOUSE_OVER_OPACITY: 0.60 # Opacity effect when mouse overing an empty leader slot for reassignmnet

TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.TOOLTIP_MIN_DAYS_FOR_ROUNDED_YEARS: 1440 # Minimum amount of days for which to display rounded years
TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.TOOLTIP_MIN_DAYS_FOR_DECIMAL_YEARS: 360  # Minimum amount of days for which to display decimal years. Is expected to be smaller than TOOLTIP_MIN_DAYS_FOR_ROUNDED_YEARS
TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.PERSISTENT_CHAT_LINE_HEIGHT: 20 # default y-size of persistent chat messages
TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE_CLOSE_WARNING_PERC: 0.30	# Percentage of time left before auto close
TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE_DURATION_STANDARD: 30	# How many days the notification should be shown
TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.ARCH_VIEW_DEFAULT_MAX_CHAPTERS: 6 # default number of supported chapters in a site, will be overriden if a site is scripted to have more
TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.ARCH_VIEW_TEXTBOX_SMALL: 200	# height of textbox when not showing an event
TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.ARCH_VIEW_TEXTBOX_LARGE: 265	# height of textbox when showing an event
TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.ARCH_VIEW_TEXTLIST_OFFSET: -20	# height offset between the texbox and the textlist
TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.MAX_COUNCIL_POSITIONS: 6 # Maximum number of possible council positions in the ui
TOOLTIP_POSITION_OFFSET_STAR.COUNCIL_GRID_ARCH_HEIGHT: 100 # Height of the vertical offset in the council position gridbox

POPS_TO_SHOW_CITY_LEVEL.TRADE_VIEW_SMALL_CREDIT_CHANGE: 10	# Decides how much value is changed while holding control when increasing/decreasing credit in trade
POPS_TO_SHOW_CITY_LEVEL.TRADE_VIEW_LARGE_CREDIT_CHANGE: 100	# Decides how much value is changed while holding shift when increasing/decreasing credit in trade
POPS_TO_SHOW_CITY_LEVEL.TRADE_VIEW_MASSIVE_CREDIT_CHANGE: 1000	# Decides how much value is changed while holding shift AND control when increasing/decreasing credit in trade
POPS_TO_SHOW_CITY_LEVEL.TRADE_VIEW_WIDE_MODE_THRESHHOLD: 1470 # Shows Trade View in wide mode if game resolution is above this
POPS_TO_SHOW_CITY_LEVEL.SHIP_NAME_CAP_LENGTH: 175	# Fleet name max width to limit Henrik Thyrwall's imagination
POPS_TO_SHOW_CITY_LEVEL.SHIP_NAME_SIZE_MAX: 26	# Max number of letters in ship names
POPS_TO_SHOW_CITY_LEVEL.SPECIES_NAME_SIZE_MAX: 20	# Max number of letters in army names

ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.ADVISOR_SOUND_MIN_WAIT: 2.0	# After playing a VO line, don't play any other VO line for X seconds
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.ADVISOR_SOUND_BLOCKED_DEFAULT: 0.0	# Default time VO line blocked from playing for X seconds
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.ADVISOR_SOUND_BLOCKED_SHIP_LOST: 10.0	# This VO line will be blocked from playing for X seconds
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.ADVISOR_SOUND_BLOCKED_FLEET_ENGAGED: 10.0	# This VO line will be blocked from playing for X seconds
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.OUTLINER_PING_TIME: 2.40	# Amount of seconds to show the ping when having selected an object from the outliner
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.FRONTEND_BUTTON_SLIDE_DURATION: 0.15	# Duration in seconds for the menu button slide effect
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.FRONTEND_BUTTON_SLIDE_DISTANCE: 10	# Movement distance in pixels for the menu button slide effect
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.FRONTEND_BUTTON_SLIDE_CURVE: 0.5	# Changes the ease in/out curve. 0.0 is linear, higher is ease in, lower is ease out.
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.DAYS_PENDING_ARCHAEOLOGY_NOTIFICATIONS: 30 # num of days archaeological notifications are shown
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.ESPIONAGE_OPERATION_VIEW_TEXTBOX_SMALL: 200	# height of textbox when not showing an event
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.ESPIONAGE_OPERATION_VIEW_TEXTBOX_LARGE: 265	# height of textbox when showing an event
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.ESPIONAGE_OPERATION_VIEW_DEFAULT_MAX_CHA: 6 # default number of supported chapters in an operation, will be overriden if an operation is scripted to have more
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.GUI_BASELINE_WIDTH: 1280	# Horizontal Resolution that GUI files are scripted for
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.GUI_BASELINE_HEIGHT: 720	# Vertical Resolution that GUI files are scripted for
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.GUI_EXTRA_HEIGHT_MAX: 0		# Experimental: Maximum pixels GUIs are allowed to expand vertically
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.ALWAYS_SHOW_NAVBAR: no # if yes then the left side navbar will always be shown
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.NAVBAR_CLOSE_DELAY: 0.5 # how long time in seconds the navbar will stay open after un-mousing it
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.OUTLINER_PLANET_CONSTRUCTION_MAX_ENTRIES: 3	# not enough space in vanilla stellaris for more. priority: starbase, tile, army, pop
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.OUTLINER_STARBASE_SHIPYARD_CONSTRUCTION_: 6 # The max number of starbase shipyard construction progress bars to show in the outliner, make sure to also update the progress bar sizes
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.SOCIALVIEW_CONTEXT_MENU_MARGIN: 2	# Margin for social view context menu
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.WAROVERVIEW_BATTLE_RESULT_BASE_EXHAUSTIO: 0.10	# In order to avoid a very small win with no losses on one side looking like it was "overwhelming
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.POP_ENTRY_GROUPING_THRESHOLD: 8 # the minimum amount of pops in the planet view jobs ui required before we start grouping them together
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.NUM_DISTRICT_BOXES_TO_SHOW: 15 # How many district boxes will be shown before we show " 12/20" instead
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.NUM_RARE_DEPOSITS_TO_SHOW: 4 # How many rare deposits will be shown before we switch the gridbox to a summary icon and "x5" instead
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.NUM_DEVASTATION_SEGMENTS: 4 # How many "levels" of devastation there is
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.AUTOMATION_RESOURCE_ALERT_MIN_POOL: 300 # Alert the player if pool is lower than this AND monthly transfer lower than the next entry
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.AUTOMATION_RESOURCE_ALERT_MIN_MONTHLY: 10 # Alert the player if pool is previous entry AND monthly transfer lower than this
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.DIPLO_SCREEN_TEXT_HIDE_COOLDOWN: 10.0	# How many seconds the alien message text in the deplomacy view will be shown
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.CITY_SELECTION_DEFAULT_PLANET_CLASS: pc_continental"	# used for special planet types that don't have different option for each species
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.DAYS_PENDING_FIRST_CONTACT_NOTIFICATIONS: 30 # num of days First Contact notifications are shown
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.DAYS_LEFT_TO_SHOW_NUMBER: 360 # Num of days until vote when this number is shown
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.DAYS_LEFT_TO_COLORIZE_NUMBER: 60 # Num of days until vote when this number is shown and colored
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.OUTLINER_HABITAT_LEVEL_LIMIT: 10 # After which level to stop showing the habitat level in the outliner
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.GAME_CONCEPT_ICON_DEFAULT: gfx/interface/icons/concepts/concept.dds" # Default icon for Game Concepts
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.RIFT_VIEW_DEFAULT_MAX_CHAPTERS: 12 # default number of supported chapters in a site, will be overriden if a site is scripted to have more
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.RIFT_VIEW_TEXTBOX_SMALL: 200	# height of textbox when not showing an event
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.RIFT_VIEW_TEXTBOX_LARGE: 265	# height of textbox when showing an event
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.RIFT_VIEW_TEXTLIST_OFFSET: -20	# height offset between the texbox and the textlist
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.COLONY_TYPE_DEFAULT_SPRITE: GFX_colony_type_picker # Sprite for the picker button, or if the colony type lacks a sprite
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.ASTRAL_ACTION_UNLOCK_NOTIFICATION_DURATI: 30 # Duration in days during which astral action unlocked notification is displayed
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.DAYS_PENDING_ASTRAL_ACTION_ALERT: 60 # Duration in days during which astral actions alert is displayed
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.FLAG_CAPITAL_DECORATION_SCALE: 1.0 # Scale for the tiny stars around map icons
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.FLAG_CAPITAL_DECORATION_SCALE_BIG_FRAME: 1.3 # Scale for the tiny stars around map icons
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.DAYS_PENDING_COSMIC_STORM_NOTIFICATIONS: 20 # num of days cosmic storm notifications are shown
ADVISOR_ANNOYED_SOUNDS.EVENT_PRESENCE_ICON_OFFSET_RATIO_EFFECT_: 1.2	# Offset (multiplicative to displayed icon) of the presence icon in event options where an effect icon is displayed
